Uses of Package
io.github.ai4ci.util

Packages that use io.github.ai4ci.util
Package
Description
io.github.ai4ci.abm
High-level documentation for the agent-based modelling package io.github.ai4ci.abm.
io.github.ai4ci.abm.inhost
In-host models for simulating viral infection dynamics within individuals.
io.github.ai4ci.abm.policy
Policy models for outbreak-level interventions and control strategies.
io.github.ai4ci.config
Provides configuration interfaces for epidemiological simulations and experiments.
io.github.ai4ci.config.execution
Execution configuration types and helpers used during experiment runs.
io.github.ai4ci.config.refdata
Package io.github.ai4ci.config.refdata
io.github.ai4ci.config.setup
Configuration types and helpers that describe how a simulation population and its social network are constructed.
io.github.ai4ci.flow
Simulation execution and data flow management for agent-based modelling.
io.github.ai4ci.flow.builders
Build-time and setup documentation for the model builder components in io.github.ai4ci.abm.builders.
io.github.ai4ci.flow.mechanics
Core mechanics and infrastructure for agent-based modeling operations.
io.github.ai4ci.functions
Package containing mathematical function implementations and utilities for the AI4CI framework.
io.github.ai4ci.output
Data export and output generation for simulation results and analytics.

    Represents a confidence interval for a binomial proportion.

    An optional value that is serializable.
    Inversion
    Given a stream of objects of type X, and a mapping that extracts objects of type Y, this class creates an index of type Y and acts as a function for retrieving the set of X which map to Y.
    Memoised
    Memoised is a utility class that implements memoization for a given function.
    Repository
    A reflection based data indexed repository class with support for foreign keys for data imported from multiple CSV files.
    Repository.FunctionKey
    A key generated from the serialization of a lambda function.
    Repository.Indexed
    An interface for entities that can be indexed in the repository.
    Repository.SerializableFunction
    A serializable function interface that extends both Serializable and Function.

    Index for a given type.

    Sparse matrix in coordinate (COO) form.

    Builder for SparseDecomposition.SparseMatrix using explicit insertion of entries.
